content: First. In my messages that I will send you later, I will refer to this information as Information About Myself. Just remember this information for now. I will message you instructions in later messages. If you understand this instruction, limit your reply by saying the word: "acknowledged". Here is a bit of information about myself that I want you to know. I am a solicitor and construction lawyer with more than 10 years experience specialising in construction law. I regularly advise homeowners and builders regarding their contractual and legal rights. I represent homeowners and builders in NSW, Australia as well as all courts of competent jurisdiction. I have advised homeowners regarding Choosing the Right Builder: Tips for Homeowners in NSW. I have advised them on their contract rights, risks and obligations. I have negotiated and amended contracts to reflect their intentions.
